title: Poems by John Hall.
author: Hall, John, 1627-1656.
publisher: Printed by [E.G., London, and] Roger Daniel printer to the Universitie, 1646. For J. Rothwell at the Sun in Pauls Church-yard [London,
notes: "The second booke of divine poems" has separate title page with imprint "London. Printed by E.G. for J. Rothwell. 1647."; pagination and register are continuous.
The portrait of Hall is signed: W. Marshall sculpsit.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
